name: Infinite Objects - Zoom & Find
description:
Find the object hidden in those Infinite Zoom Art. Are you ready for experience crazy infinity zoom art with just one action: ZOOM IN!
HOW TO PLAY
- ZOOM in and out the infinite arts to seek objects
- FOLLOW the rules and start LOOKING
- SWIPE maps and TAP the hidden objects

Seek and find games have never been this fun. DOWNLOAD FOR FREE now!!!
